Entries.Introduction: Hey, kid. The name's {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PamName}}.#$e#Don't be a jerk and we'll get along fine.^Don't be a bitch and we'll get along fine.
Entries.Saloon_Entry: Ah... Finally./I need a drink./{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GusName}}! Gimme the usual./Hey, I'm back!/Ooh boy, am I thirsty!/I'm parched!
Entries.Trailer_Entry: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PennyName}}! Did you make dinner?/{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PennyName}}! You done your chores?/{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PennyName}}! You home?/Hey! I'm home!
Entries.Saloon_Fri: Oi, {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GusName}}! Gimme another pint of your strongest!
Entries.Saloon_Sun: %{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PamName}} seems out of it. Better leave her alone right now.
Entries.Thu: #$1 PamDrunk#Blahh... I had one too many caramel porters at the saloon last night... Go away.$k#$e#My house ain't pretty but at least it's by the river.#$e#Hey. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PennyName}}'s my baby girl. Be nice to her or leave her alone, got it?
Entries.Thu4: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PennyName}} says I spend too much time at the saloon...$s
Entries.Sun: Are you friends with {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GusName}}? {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GusGender}}}}'s a pretty good {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Guy:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GusGender}}}}.#$e#{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GusGender}}}} even gives me free beer on my birthday.
Entries.fall_Thu: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PennyName}}'s the only one I've got, so you best treat her kindly.
Entries.winter_Tue4: I just hope {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PennyName}} has a good life ahead of her. If you ever have kids you'll know how I feel.#$e#...It's so dry in winter. My skin feels like old parchment.
Entries.winter_Tue4_inlaw_Penny: Hey. You better be treatin' {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PennyName}} right on that old farm of yours. She's the only one I got!
Entries.winter_Fri: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PennyName}} sure does like old books. I think she's a heck of a lot smarter than I ever was.#$e#I'm glad.
